text: Borschova by levitskiy Natalya Semyonovna Borshchov (1758–1843), was a Russian courtier. She served as lady in waiting to grand duchess Maria Feodorovna (Sophie Dorothea of Württemberg). She was a favorite of Maria, accompanied her to France in 1782, and known at court as a talented amateur actress. She was a graduate of the Smolny Institute. == References == * Знаменитые россияне 18-19 веков. Биография и портреты. — С.-Петербург.: Лениздат, 1996. — с.320. Category:1758 births Category:1843 deaths Category:18th-century Russian people Category:Russian ladies-in-waiting
title: Natalya Borshchov
